Generate continuous outcome data with nonlinear X dependence

generate_continuous_dgp.Rd

True model: Y = f(X1, ..., X5) + noise X6-X10 are noise features not in the true model

Usage

generate_continuous_dgp(N, mu_x = 1, sigma_y = 2, seed = NULL)

Arguments

N

Number of observations

mu_x

Mean of X features (controls distribution shift)

sigma_y

Noise standard deviation

seed

Random seed

Value

List with X matrix, Y vector, and true conditional mean

Details

KEY DESIGN: X ~ N(mu_x, 1). Train on mu_x=1, test on mu_x=1,3,5,7,9. This creates distribution shift that exposes bias in misspecified models.

On this page
